family_offices.name: DNS Capital

recent_activities.headline: Vermillio Secures $16 Million Funding From Sony Music, DNS Capital
recent_activities.description: Vermillio, an AI licensing and protection platform, secured $16 million in series A funding from Sony Music and DNS Capital.
recent_activities.full_text: Vermillio has raised a total of $16 million in funding from a group that includes Sony Music and DNS Capital. The funds will be used to further develop its AI technology aimed at protecting music rights.

recent_activities.headline: Recogni Raises $48.9 Million Series B Investment Led by WRVI
recent_activities.description: Recogni, a company focused on AI solutions, raised $48.9 million from several investors including DNS Capital.
recent_activities.full_text: Recogni, a vision processing company focused on creating a new standard for automotive sensing solutions, announced an investment round that included $48.9 million in funding, led by WRVI Capital and featuring contributions from DNS Capital.

key_transactions.description: Investment in Vermillio, an AI licensing and protection platform.
Part of a series B funding round for Recogni.

family_offices.strategy_insights: DNS Capital continues to focus on long-term investments in technology companies, particularly those developing AI and innovative solutions.
family_offices.leadership_changes: No significant leadership changes reported in the past 10 years.

recent_activities.headline: Gresham Partners Launches New Fund

recent_activities.full_text: Gresham Partners is excited to announce the launch of its new private equity fund, designed to provide substantial returns for our investors by engaging with promising growth companies.
